name: Zwischen Der Zeit
description:
Browser and Android-release of the interactive music video for KickerDibs' new Song "Zwischen Der Zeit", if you fancy a different wording than Shoot-Em-Up synchronized to music.

This was a 30 hour promo-project for their upcoming "Zwischen der Zeit" - Tour 2018

Visit the trio from Berlin @www.kickerdibs.de to learn more about them!
